text: Greatest Hits Live (also known as Odyssey Live) was the eleventh concert tour by British band Take That, in support of their compilation album, Odyssey (2018). The tour began in Sheffield, England at FlyDSA Arena on 12 April 2019, and ended on 30 June 2019, in Zürich, Switzerland at Hallenstadion, consisting of 52 shows. ==Set list== UK & Ireland Leg: #"Greatest Day" #"It Only Takes a Minute" #"These Days" #"Could It Be Magic" #"Everything Changes" (with Robbie Williams on screen) #"Out of Our Heads" #"A Million Love Songs" #"Sure" #"Love Ain't Odyssey: Greatest Hits Live was released as a limited edition DVD/CD and Blu-ray on 15 November 2019. ==References== Category:Take That concert tours Category:2019 concert tours
